scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:js:dev && npm run build:css:dev
scripts.watch: npm run build:js:dev && npm run build:css:dev && npm run copy:static && (npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:static)
scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && for dir in */; do case "$dir" in dist/|css/|js/|node_modules/|.git/) ;; *) cp -r "$dir" dist/ ;; esac; done
